original_text: In conclusion, a new approach to the grind-free nanoprecursor route to direct combinatorial solid state synthesis of several difficult to make and hitherto unknown phase-pure heterometallic Ruddlesden Popper type La4Ni3−xFexO10 materials has been described. The new approach used a high-throughput reactor and robotic automation (RAMSI) to rapidly synthesise a range of nanoparticle co-precipitate precursors in cloned libraries at a rate of 7.5 samples an hour. Each library could then be heat-treated at a different temperature and an initial powder XRD screen was used to locate and approximate phase boundary. A more focussed second synthesis and XRD characterisation of selected larger heat-treated powders was then performed to reconfirm the locations of the phase boundaries with the highest dopant level being achieved for La4Ni2FeO10 which is significantly greater Fe doping than has been achieved by anyone previously (despite several notable efforts). EXAFS data suggested that Fe3+ was located onto Ni sites in all cases and did not exist as a separate iron oxide phase.
original_translation: En conclusión, se ha descrito un nuevo enfoque para la síntesis de estado sólido combinatoria directa de varios materiales heterometálicos de tipo Ruddlesden Popper La4Ni3−xFexO10, difíciles de fabricar y hasta ahora desconocidos, a través de una ruta de nanoprecursor sin molienda. El nuevo enfoque utilizó un reactor de alto rendimiento y automatización robótica (RAMSI) para sintetizar rápidamente una gama de precursores de nanopartículas co-precipitadas en bibliotecas clonadas a una velocidad de 7.5 muestras por hora. Cada biblioteca podía ser tratada térmicamente a diferentes temperaturas y se utilizó una pantalla inicial de difracción de rayos X en polvo para localizar y aproximar el límite de fase. Luego se realizó una segunda síntesis más enfocada y caracterización por difracción de rayos X de polvos tratados térmicamente seleccionados más grandes para reconfirmar las ubicaciones de los límites de fase, logrando el nivel de dopaje más alto para La4Ni2FeO10, que es un dopaje de Fe significativamente mayor que el logrado por cualquier persona anteriormente (a pesar de varios esfuerzos notables). Los datos EXAFS sugirieron que el Fe3+ estaba ubicado en los sitios de Ni en todos los casos y no existía como una fase separada de óxido de hierro.

The new approach used a high-throughput reactor and robotic automation (RAMSI) to rapidly synthesise a range of nanoparticle co-precipitate precursors in cloned libraries at a rate of 7.5 samples an hour.
Each library could then be heat-treated at a different temperature and an initial powder XRD screen was used to locate and approximate phase boundary.

A more focussed second synthesis and XRD characterisation of selected larger heat-treated powders was then performed to reconfirm the locations of the phase boundaries with the highest dopant level being achieved for La4Ni2FeO10 which is significantly greater Fe doping than has been achieved by anyone previously (despite several notable efforts).
EXAFS data suggested that Fe3+ was located onto Ni sites in all cases and did not exist as a separate iron oxide phase.

El nuevo enfoque utilizó un reactor de alto rendimiento y automatización robótica (RAMSI) para sintetizar rápidamente una gama de precursores de nanopartículas co-precipitadas en bibliotecas clonadas a una velocidad de 7.5 muestras por hora.
Cada biblioteca podía ser tratada térmicamente a diferentes temperaturas y se utilizó una pantalla inicial de difracción de rayos X en polvo para localizar y aproximar el límite de fase.

direct combinatorial solid state synthes.translated_key: síntesis de estado sólido combinatoria directa
original_annotated_sentences:
In conclusion, a new approach to the grind-free nanoprecursor route to
direct combinatorial solid state synthesis
of several difficult to make and hitherto unknown phase-pure heterometallic Ruddlesden Popper type La4Ni3−xFexO10 materials has been described.

The new approach used a high-throughput reactor and robotic automation (RAMSI) to rapidly synthesise a range of nanoparticle co-precipitate precursors in cloned libraries at a rate of 7.5 samples an hour.
Each library could then be heat-treated at a different temperature and an initial powder XRD screen was used to locate and approximate phase boundary.

A more focussed second synthesis and XRD characterisation of selected larger heat-treated powders was then performed to reconfirm the locations of the phase boundaries with the highest dopant level being achieved for La4Ni2FeO10 which is significantly greater Fe doping than has been achieved by anyone previously (despite several notable efforts).
EXAFS data suggested that Fe3+ was located onto Ni sites in all cases and did not exist as a separate iron oxide phase.

A more focussed second synthesis and XRD characterisation of selected larger heat-treated powders was then performed to reconfirm the locations of the phase boundaries with the highest dopant level being achieved for La4Ni2FeO10 which is significantly greater Fe doping than has been achieved by anyone previously (despite several notable efforts).

EXAFS data suggested that Fe3+ was located onto Ni sites in all cases and did not exist as a separate
iron oxide
phase.

iron oxide.translated_text:
En conclusión, se ha descrito un nuevo enfoque para la síntesis de estado sólido combinatoria directa de varios materiales heterometálicos de tipo Ruddlesden Popper La4Ni3−xFexO10, difíciles de fabricar y hasta ahora desconocidos, a través de una ruta de nanoprecursor sin molienda. El nuevo enfoque utilizó un reactor de alto rendimiento y automatización robótica (RAMSI) para sintetizar rápidamente una gama de precursores de nanopartículas co-precipitadas en bibliotecas clonadas a una velocidad de 7.5 muestras por hora. Cada biblioteca podía ser tratada térmicamente a diferentes temperaturas y se utilizó una pantalla inicial de difracción de rayos X en polvo para localizar y aproximar el límite de fase. Luego se realizó una segunda síntesis más enfocada y caracterización por difracción de rayos X de polvos tratados térmicamente seleccionados más grandes para reconfirmar las ubicaciones de los límites de fase, logrando el nivel de dopaje más alto para La4Ni2FeO10, que es un dopaje de Fe significativamente mayor que el logrado por cualquier persona anteriormente (a pesar de varios esfuerzos notables). Los datos EXAFS sugirieron que el Fe3+ estaba ubicado en los sitios de Ni en todos los casos y no existía como una fase separada de
óxido de hierro
.

The new approach used a high-throughput reactor and robotic automation (RAMSI) to rapidly synthesise a range of nanoparticle co-precipitate precursors in cloned libraries at a rate of 7.5 samples an hour.

La4Ni2FeO10
which is significantly greater Fe doping than has been achieved by anyone previously (despite several notable efforts).
EXAFS data suggested that Fe3+ was located onto Ni sites in all cases and did not exist as a separate iron oxide phase.

original_annotated_sentences:
In conclusion, a
new approach to the grind-free nanoprecursor route to direct combinatorial solid state synthesis
of several difficult to make and hitherto unknown phase-pure heterometallic Ruddlesden Popper type La4Ni3−xFexO10 materials has been described.

The new approach used a high-throughput reactor and robotic automation (RAMSI) to rapidly synthesise a range of nanoparticle co-precipitate precursors in cloned libraries at a rate of 7.5 samples an hour.
Each library could then be heat-treated at a different temperature and an initial powder XRD screen was used to locate and approximate phase boundary.

A more focussed second synthesis and XRD characterisation of selected larger heat-treated powders was then performed to reconfirm the locations of the phase boundaries with the highest dopant level being achieved for La4Ni2FeO10 which is significantly greater Fe doping than has been achieved by anyone previously (despite several notable efforts).
EXAFS data suggested that Fe3+ was located onto Ni sites in all cases and did not exist as a separate iron oxide phase.

A more focussed second synthesis and XRD characterisation of selected larger heat-treated powders was then performed to reconfirm the locations of the phase boundaries with the highest dopant level being achieved for La4Ni2FeO10 which is significantly greater Fe doping than has been achieved by anyone previously (despite several notable efforts).
EXAFS data suggested that Fe3+ was located onto Ni sites in all cases and did not exist as a separate iron oxide phase.

The new approach used a high-throughput reactor and
robotic automation
(RAMSI) to rapidly synthesise a range of nanoparticle co-precipitate precursors in cloned libraries at a rate of 7.5 samples an hour.
translated_annotated_samples:
El nuevo enfoque utilizó un reactor de alto rendimiento y
automatización robótica
(RAMSI) para sintetizar rápidamente una gama de precursores de nanopartículas co-precipitadas en bibliotecas clonadas a una velocidad de 7.5 muestras por hora.
robotic automation.translated_text:
En conclusión, se ha descrito un nuevo enfoque para la síntesis de estado sólido combinatoria directa de varios materiales heterometálicos de tipo Ruddlesden Popper La4Ni3−xFexO10, difíciles de fabricar y hasta ahora desconocidos, a través de una ruta de nanoprecursor sin molienda. El nuevo enfoque utilizó un reactor de alto rendimiento y
automatización robótica
(RAMSI) para sintetizar rápidamente una gama de precursores de nanopartículas co-precipitadas en bibliotecas clonadas a una velocidad de 7.5 muestras por hora. Cada biblioteca podía ser tratada térmicamente a diferentes temperaturas y se utilizó una pantalla inicial de difracción de rayos X en polvo para localizar y aproximar el límite de fase. Luego se realizó una segunda síntesis más enfocada y caracterización por difracción de rayos X de polvos tratados térmicamente seleccionados más grandes para reconfirmar las ubicaciones de los límites de fase, logrando el nivel de dopaje más alto para La4Ni2FeO10, que es un dopaje de Fe significativamente mayor que el logrado por cualquier persona anteriormente (a pesar de varios esfuerzos notables). Los datos EXAFS sugirieron que el Fe3+ estaba ubicado en los sitios de Ni en todos los casos y no existía como una fase separada de óxido de hierro.

Each library could then be heat-treated at a different temperature and an initial powder XRD screen was used to locate and approximate phase boundary.

A more focussed second

of selected larger heat-treated powders was then performed to reconfirm the locations of the phase boundaries with the highest dopant level being achieved for La4Ni2FeO10 which is significantly greater Fe doping than has been achieved by anyone previously (despite several notable efforts).
EXAFS data suggested that Fe3+ was located onto Ni sites in all cases and did not exist as a separate iron oxide phase.
